title: 关于 ess插件和saml插件的报错
author: 我爱魁拔
txt_content:
本帖最后由 我爱魁拔 于 2020-2-21 11:37 编辑 

1.ess插件输入有些指令时 会显示缺失翻译文件 那翻译文件在哪？
2.saml每间隔一段时间就会报错
两种情况具体内容均在下图

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 EmptyLava 于 2020-2-21 11:52 编辑 

翻译文件在jar里面
如果你不想自己折腾就换把ess插件全部换掉

replies.author: 我爱魁拔
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-2-21 11:51
翻译文件在jar里面
如果你不想自己折腾就换把ess插件全部换掉
谢谢 另外一个问题的解决方法，我在spigotmc 里找到了froobynooby
Author's Response
Hey, thanks for the review!

I believe this error is due to CatServer having different mappings to Spigot, which unfortunately means you can't use the nerf mechanic of SAML. I think the freeze mechanic should still work fine though.

To disable the plugin nerfing anything: open the config.yml and remove anything from the passive-nerf-groups and tps-nerf-groups lists.
